message: All metadata fields for the indicator 2-c-1, translated into en
data: Goal 2. End hunger, achieve food security, improve nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture2.c Adopt measures aimed at ensuring the proper functioning of markets for foodstuffs and derived products and at facilitating rapid access to information relating to these markets, including the level of food reserves, in order to help limit the extreme food price volatility2.c.1 Indicator of tariff anomalies for foodstuffsNot available
